PHRASE.LANG: At least you know it doesn't like going for walks. [#Legal]
Les balades ne vont pas être de tout repos. [#Legal]
Zumindest weiß man, dass es nicht gerne spazieren geht. [#Legal]
Almeno sai che non devi portarlo a spasso. [#Legal]
Al menos sabes que no le gusta que lo saquen de paseo. [#Legal]
같이 산책을 할 때는 언제나 깡총깡총 뛰어야 합니다. [#Legal]
At least you know it doesn't like going for walks. [#Legal]
你起碼知道牠不喜歡散步。 [#Legal]
你起碼知道牠不喜歡散步。 [#Legal]
At least you know it doesn't like going for walks. [#Legal]
